titles.title: A resolution to refer H.R. 1540 to the chief judge of the United States Claims Court.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

bill.summary: 3/11/1987--Introduced. Refers H.R. 1540, a bill for the relief of two named individuals, to the chief judge of the United States Claims Court.
